author: Meagan Flynn
title: Top doctor at Rikers Island calls the jail a ‘public health disaster unfolding before our eyes’ - Washington Post
description: Top doctor at Rikers Island calls the jail a ‘public health disaster unfolding before our eyes’ Washington Post Inmates charged with violent crimes poised for release due to COVID-19 ABC News ‘We’re Left for Dead’: Fears of Coronavirus Catastrophe at Rikers J…
content: In a Twitter thread addressed to the district attorneys in the citys five boroughs, the doctor, Ross MacDonald, urged prosecutors to support the continued release of vulnerable inmates to avoid a public health disaster. At least 167 inmates and 137 correction… [+7086 chars]
